articles.description: Timo Werner scored a hat-trick as RB Leipzig demolished hosts Mainz 5-0 on Sunday to reclaim third place in the Bundesliga
articles.content:
Timo Werner scored a hat-trick as RB Leipzig demolished hosts Mainz 5-0 on Sunday to reclaim third place in the Bundesliga after their disappointing draw with Freiburg last week.

articles.title: Silverstone tells members 'don't ask for refunds' - PlanetF1
articles.description: British Racing Drivers' Club chairman John Grant has pleaded with members not to ask for ticket refunds as Silverstone battles to balance its books.
articles.content:
